paper_abstract: We give an algorithm to decompose a fuzzy interval u. Using this decomposition and the multilinearization of a univariate function f, we obtain an approximation of the fuzzy interval f(u), where f is obtained from f by applying the extension principle. We provide approximation bounds. Some numeric illustration is provided. (C) 2007 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The extension principle and a decomposition of fuzzy sets
